summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.5°C) and outside temperature (down 4.9°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 729 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 8214 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.1 mm), cloud levels (up 1676 m), and light levels (up 10069 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 728.9m lower than yesterday, 651.1m lower than the past week, 1675.8m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 1059m and a high of 3380m, averaging 995.3m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.
